content: a stylish crochet cup cozy pattern featuring a textured twist cable design this reusable crochet coffee sleeve fits a grande size cup and adds both warmth and elegance quick and easy to make it s the perfect textured crochet pattern for whose who want to practice front post stitches and learn how to create a simple cable crochet stitch an eco-friendly handmade accessory for everyday coffee lovers skill level easy / intermediate / size 16 oz / 475 ml grande cup technical details - yarn worsted #4 100% cotton 18 g 28 m / 31 yds - hook us g-6 4 0 mm - instructions written + chart / photo tutorials - language en / us-terms when you purchase or download my patterns directly from my official shops ravelry or my website you get free updates if the pattern is revised or improved direct support from the designer in case you have questions high-quality files with clear photos and instructions and most importantly you re supporting an independent designer
